detail.document-not-available: The document will be available for download in a few minutes. You can try again by reloading the page or clicking on the link of the requested document
detail.cancelled-alert-text: This notification has been canceled by the sending institution. You can ignore the content.

payment.title: Payment
payment.single-payment-subtitle: The final amount may be different than what is indicated.
payment.subtitle: This notification contains multiple payment notifications: select what you want to pay. Some notifications include notification costs.
payment.subtitle-f24: You can pay this notification via F24. To see the details, open the forms.
payment.subtitle-mixed: This notification contains multiple payment options: select or download what you want to pay. Some amounts include notification costs.
payment.cancelled-alert-text-payment: For any reimbursement of payments related to this notification, contact the sending institution. If you made a payment after the notification was canceled, the list may not be updated.
payment.pay-with-f24: If you prefer, you can pay via F24.
payment.message-error-fetch-payment: We were unable to retrieve payment details for this notification.
payment.cancelled-message: For any reimbursement of payments related to this notification, contact the sending institution. If you made a payment after the notification was canceled, the information here below may not be updated.
payment.f24-download-error: The download was not successful. Try again.

status.succeded-tooltip: The payment has been sent successfully.
status.failed-tooltip: The notification has expired and it can no longer be paid. For more information, contact the sender.
status.inprogress-tooltip: The payment is in progress. Reload the page in a few hours to verify. If it is still in progress, contact support.
status.canceled-tooltip: The notification has been revoked. For more information, contact the sender.

error.notice-error: There is a problem with this notification.

tppLanding.title:
Hi,
You have received a legally binding communication
tppLanding.description: To read it, log in to SEND - Servizio Notifiche Digitali. You will find important documents concerning you. Even if you do not open or read it, the communication produces legal effects.

what-are-notifications.question: What are legally binding communications?
what-are-notifications.answer: It means that the sending and receiving of these communications produce legal effects for both the sender and the recipient. For example, if you receive a traffic fine, the date you receive it affects the amount you must pay or your right to contest it.

what-is-send.question: What is SEND - Servizio Notifiche Digitali?
what-is-send.answer:
SEND - Servizio Notifiche Digitali is a platform that digitizes and simplifies the management of notifications: it allows you to receive them, download notified documents, and pay any amounts directly online.
SEND can send notifications on behalf of institutions to citizens, freelancers, and sole traders (i.e., "natural persons") as well as to companies (i.e., "legal persons").
